import React from 'react'; import {connect} from 'react-redux' import {createStructuredSelector} from 'reselect' import {selectItems,selectTotal} from '../../redux/cart/cart.reselectors.js' import styles from './cart-table.module.css'; import {TableRow} from '../../components' import CustomeButton from '../../components/custom-button/custom-button.component' class CartTable extends React.Component { render() { const {items,total} = this.props return (
Product Name
Price
Quantity
Total
Action
{ items.map((item , ind)=> () ) }
Total
{total}
Clear Items
Pay
); } } const mapStateToProps = createStructuredSelector({ items:selectItems, total: selectTotal }) export default connect(mapStateToProps)( CartTable);
